objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Romance themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Romance narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Romance lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a romantic encounter or relationship development involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a romance context
Students engage in romance themed role-play about technology in daily life using slang register
Students create original romance themed content about technology in daily life in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Romance scenario?
What heart or passion might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Romance story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Romance perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this romance scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Romance situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using slang register in romance context
Character B: Responding in slang register within romance theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with heart
technology in daily life with passion
technology in daily life with affection

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Romance theme: Love, relationships, emotional connections

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Romance themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
